data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of São Tomé.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 9,348 believers living in São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of São João dos Angolares
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of São João dos Angolares, São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of São Tomé to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.focus_label: São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe
data.section_summary:
the state of São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe has a population of 157,000.

We estimate São Tomé has 9,348 people who might know Jesus, 125,967 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 21,685 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in São Tomé, São Tomé and Príncipe honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
